data.text:
Do you know Dax Shephard or someone in his orbit? 

I need to get in touch with him or his team. He's a BIG fan of nicotine spray as it helped him quit tobacco.

author.headline: Co-founder and CEO of VYE | Building responsible solutions for a post-tobacco era.

data.text:
VYE was recently invited to give a talk and be part of a panel at the New Approaches Conference in NY. The panel featured oral nicotine products designed to get people off of tobacco.

As a reminder, 8 million people every year die of a tobacco related illness.

I was honored to share the stage with other innovators Alexander HÃ¤ggqvist of NOAT and Katherine Ilkhani of Zolv and a renowned nicotine behavioral scientist Dr. Christopher Russell.

Huge thank you to Azim Chowdhury for hosting the panel and the SkyX Group (Martin Steinbauer and Kylie Halperin) for building a conference with such useful and needed content.

Through conferences like New Approaches we've learned how important it is to give people a quick, fresh, and discrete way to transition from tobacco products to a non-tobacco nicotine product. It literally saves lives.

That's why Michael Salmon and I are pushing hard to bring VYE to market in the UK early next year. Can't wait to see the product in market!

author.headline: Co-founder and CEO of VYE | Building responsible solutions for a post-tobacco era.

author.headline: Founder & CEO | Product Designer | Experience-Based Solutions | Veteran

resharedPost.text:
Happy New Year y'all! I wanted to post this already, but the holidays.
Big win for everyone on the Puffin Drinkwear team as we officially landed at Zumiez. Great to have that many more locations to connect Puffins with their new friends and families. New Year's resolution - make people happy ðŸ˜Š
#marketing #zumiez #newyear #2025

author.headline: Chief Marketing Officer | Brand Builder | Patented Product Designer

data.text:
As a mall rat in the 90â€™s (I literally grew up at Clackamas Town Center as my dad was a dentist and, oddly, his office was at the mall), this is another one of those full-circle entrepreneurial experiences for me. Zumiez first opened there somewhere around 1992 and was just two doors down from Gentle Dental. Every day that I had to join my dad for the day, I entertained myself by trolling through the mall and spent the bulk of my time in this cool â€œCalifornia skaterâ€ shop. I was around so often one employee once took me to lunch at chick-fil-a to introduce me to waffle fries!

All that to say, having Puffin Drinkwear land in such good company with such a personal connection to me is a bit surreal. 

Thanks to the crew on both ends that worked to make this happen!

author.headline: Founder & Head of Partnerships @ Puffin Drinkwear | Public Speaker | Entrepreneurship Navigator

resharedPost.text:
Check out "Will and Harper" on Netflix, Will Ferrell's new movie. Cornelius and Dolores (Will and Harper's beers) are decked out in Puffins to bring an element of joy to a road trip full of twists and turns. We'll leave it there so we don't spoil the story. Take a look.
https://lnkd.in/gep4zdHe
#willandharper #netflix

data.text: That's Will Ferrell with my product in hand! This is one of the moments we entrepreneurs dream about. Seeing our product out in the real world, in a big way. It was pretty surreal to sit down one Friday night and fire up Netflix. While grabbing a drink for my own Puffin, Netflix auto-played a clip from the new release Will & Harper and there they were; two gorgeous beers clad in the finest of Puffin Drinkwear Beverage Jackets. We had no idea we were a part of the film, so to say I was surprised is an understatement. Thanks for the experience, Netflix and Will & Harper!

author.headline: I help businesses transform expenses into donations to elevate impact, culture, and brand | CEO @ Purpose In Expenses (PIE) | Systematic giving thought leader helping liberate available capital for community impact

data.text: Couldn't be more proud and impressed by my friend Jamie Bianchini's new start-up Purpose In Expenses. That fact that I can SAVE MONEY on my already occurring expenses AND HELP GOOD CAUSES is a mind-bender...but I've now seen it in action (and do now understand how it all works). If you have a company...and your company has expenses...talk to Jamie. Win-Win-Win.

author.headline: Founder & Head of Partnerships @ Puffin Drinkwear | Public Speaker | Entrepreneurship Navigator

data.text:
ðŸ³ï¸â€ðŸŒˆ Love is Love ðŸ³ï¸â€ðŸŒˆ

Just like love, Puffins are for everybody!

Introducing the Pride Vest - a statement piece that screams "I'm here, I'm queer, and I'm sipping a perfectly chilled beer!"

Show your support for your #lgbtqia friends and family with a cut-off denim vest that looks tough, but stays chill!
Â 
10% of the proceeds from the Pride Vest are being donated directly to Free Mom Hugs, helping them in their mission "To empower the world to celebrate the LGBTQIA+ community through visibility, education, and conversation."

Free Mom Hugs Inc. literally goes to LGBTQ+ events and spreads joy by embracing people in the warm arms of a mother, we couldn't dream of a better Good Together match!

I couldn't me more proud of what our team has accomplished and the talent we've been able to attract here at Puffin Drinkwear. So much news here! 

Our new powerhouse CEO Tory Upham is taking the reigns from our powerhouse Interim-CEO Scott A. and the transition is going smoothly.

Also, we learned on Tuesday that we ranked #131 on the Inc 5000 annual rankings for fastest growing companies in the nation. We were also 12th out of all product companies, and #1 in Oregon! As a native Oregonian, this is a really special accolade for me.

Thanks to my team members here at Puffin Drinkwear, current and former, for the efforts they've put in and challenges they've endured to make this happen. These are some BIG WINS!

Thanks also to Shop-eat-surf for getting the news out.

https://lnkd.in/gW_9wsPC

This is a question Iâ€™ve been asked to think about â€“ and Iâ€™m excited to share that Iâ€™ll be joining the teams at @saxxunderwear @phacktory and @pellinglab on Sat, Jan 18 for the worldâ€™s first-ever #UndieHackathon. Whatâ€™s a hackathon? Itâ€™s a day where a bunch of people get together to form teams, eat and drink, and come up with wacky and wild ideas â€“ and Iâ€™ll be participating as a mentor/judge to determine the most innovative idea. Come drink beer and rethink underwear with us â€“ no previous hackathon experience required (and winning team gets a monthâ€™s worth of SAXX Underwear!)
